meanings.definition: A rash or skin eruption, especially one accompanying a disease such as measles or scarlet fever.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the child's exanthem as a symptom of measles.
meanings.sent2: The exanthem on her skin was a clear sign of the illness she had.
meanings.sent3: The exanthem seemed to be playing hide and seek with the doctor's diagnosis.
meanings.sent4: The red exanthem spread like wildfire across her skin.
meanings.sent5: The exanthem looked like a map of the illness, guiding the doctor to the right diagnosis.

meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by a rash or eruption.
meanings.sent1: His exanthem caused discomfort and itchiness.
meanings.sent2: The exanthem was a visible indicator of the skin condition.
meanings.sent3: The exanthem decided to make an appearance at the worst possible time.
meanings.sent4: Her exanthem was a storm brewing beneath the surface of her skin.
meanings.sent5: The exanthem painted a vivid picture of the skin's distress.
